com.google.android.droiddriver.finders

Class XPaths

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.droiddriver.finders.XPaths

  • public class XPaths
extends Object
    Convenience methods and constants for XPath.

    DroidDriver implementation uses default XPath library on device, so the support may be limited to XPath 1.0. Newer XPath features may not be supported, for example, the fn:matches function.

    • Method Detail

      • tag

        public static String tag(String className)
        Returns:
        The tag name used to build UiElement DOM. It is preferable to use this to build XPath instead of String literals.

        public static String withDescendant(String descendantPredicate)
